org.kymjs.aframe.ui.activity

类 KJFrameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.kymjs.aframe.ui.activity.KJFrameActivity
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    I_KJActivity, I_SkipActivity, I_BroadcastReg
    直接已知子类:
    BaseActivity

    public abstract class KJFrameActivity
extends Activity
implements I_BroadcastReg, I_KJActivity, I_SkipActivity
    Activity's framework,the developer shouldn't extends it
    创建时间 2014-3-1
    最后修改时间 2014-5-30
    版本:
    1.7
    作者:
    kymjs(kymjs123@gmail.com)
